attributes.action: Stop the £800 million expansion of the largest oil refinery in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The refinery is located near Southampton which is already most polluted city in the UK. This expansion will not increase the local economy as exxonmobil is an american multinational so profits will be exported. It will only create a few, if any, temporary jobs with and average of 196 temporary jobs during construction (page 13 of the planning statement).
attributes.background: Fawley oil refinery is the largest and most polluting refinery in the UK. The £800 million expansion will increase the emission of sulphur dioxide and nitrogen oxides, both linked to respiratory diseases. This goes against the Paris agreement, and the UK's declaration of a climate emergency.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for New Forest District Council. You can find out more about petitioning them at:

http://www.newforest.gov.uk/article/10653/Petitions-Scheme
